subject: Delivery delayed
description_text:
Hello,

I did an order on November 20 under the number
SSN3679.

I paid the express delivery for which is between 3-7 days. As it was do a
gift. However we are at 9 of December. And already pass 19 days , no notice
of when will be delivered.

Looks like I paid for a service that I didnâ€™t received so I would like to
have return my money and with this bad experience I will never try again to
buy here.

Thank you.

conversations.body_text: Hi Javi,  Hello, I'm sorry for the delay in logistics. My tracking information shows your order has already been signed for.
